content:
Posted: July 21, 2014
												A pretty nice expansion pack/DLC although,the dinosaur choice is kind of meh because they only have ten dinosaurs and one giant turtle called archelon. The upside to the DLC is the missions, the missions were actually fun ecspecially the one where you had to rescue the dinosaurs from the military. All in all this is a great expansion pack for an awesome game (even though there isn't alot to it).

content:
Posted: December 29, 2016
												The clipping in the game while moving around is terrible, and the quests appear to not work. I was standing right next to "Sparrow" for the first quest, and it was still asking me to find her -- I also kept getting graphical glitches where a "rider" NPC would flash over the screen for a fraction of a second and be gone. Would not reccomend this game, it is nothing like the original Wildlife Park, which has more of a roller coaster tycoon sort of feel.
